metadata.name: Yona , the Champion of The Dragon’s Peak Kingdom
metadata.description:
Prestige at the Peak of Protection ! 

"Backing the temple was a majestic curtain of falling water, its misty spray painting rainbows in the air behind the grounds. We called it Dragonfall.

The largest of these falls provided the Temple’s seven-color-hued aura. Traveling from the point of impact, the water moved to surround the temple, forming a stream that ran 12 feet across. The sunlight which reflected off its surface always made it look as if the temple wore a choker studded with diamonds.

The water then continued its journey through a submerged passage, and flew out of the mountain face through the jaws of a gigantic dragon’s head, carved directly into the mountain’s stone. It’s where I was currently standing."

My submission for Juuni's lore art contest.
